snippet: Community bankers overwhelmingly supported Donald J. Trump’s campaign. Now, as mega-banks’ stock soars, they too are looking ahead to the benefits of his administration....
abstract: Donald J Trump's promises to deregulate financial industry has sent sector's stocks soaring, surprising analysts and other finance experts who are still attempting to figure out president-elect's plans; small community banks say they are in best position since they believe Trump can loosen rules for them while still being tough on large institutions that created 2008 financial crisis.
lead_paragraph: Community bankers overwhelmingly supported Donald J. Trump’s campaign. Now, as mega-banks’ stock soars, they too are looking ahead to the benefits of his administration.

headline.main: Small Banks Cheer Trump. So, After a Pause, Do Big Ones.
headline.print_headline: Small Banks Cheer Trump. So Do Big Ones.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Dodd-Frank Wall Street Reform and Consumer Protection Act (2010)
